# DataBender - AI-Powered Data Consulting
# https://databender.co

## Quick Facts

- **Company**: DataBender
- **Founded**: 2023
- **Founder**: Grant Bender (8+ years Fortune 500 consulting experience)
- **Focus**: Mid-market companies in regulated industries
- **Location**: United States
- **Specialty**: AI-powered data consulting - data strategy, analytics, and AI automation

## Key Results (From Real Client Projects)

| Metric | Result | Context |
|--------|--------|---------|
| 125x | Cost savings vs manual data cleanup | AI agents processed 1.69M records |
| 31% | Higher prediction accuracy | vs standard CRM lead scoring |
| 1.69M | Records processed | Using 10 parallel AI agents |
| 70+ | Document formats supported | Document intelligence system |
| 2 sec | Average AI answer time | Knowledge base queries |

## Services Overview

### Data & AI Strategy
Connect your systems, clean your data, and map out AI adoption that sticks.

**Capabilities:**
- Data Foundation: Data warehouse, pipelines, and governance
- Data Integration: Connect CRM, ERP, and everything else into one view
- AI-Powered Data Cleanup: Fix duplicates at 125x less cost than manual review
- AI Readiness Assessment: Clear picture of what's realistic before you invest
- AI Roadmapping: Prioritize by ROI and feasibility with quarterly milestones
- AI Governance & Compliance: Bias monitoring, audit trails, explainability

### Analytics & BI
Real-time visibility into sales, marketing, and operations.

**Capabilities:**
- Dashboards: Visual KPIs, trends, and drill-downs
- Agentic Research: AI agents that autonomously gather and analyze information
- Operational Visibility: Real-time monitoring and alerts
- Predictive Analytics: Demand planning, churn prediction, resource optimization
- Managed Data Pipelines: Automated data flows that keep analytics fresh
- Custom Analytical Applications: Purpose-built tools for specific workflows

### AI & Automation
AI that actually knows your business.

**Capabilities:**
- Natural Language BI: Ask questions in plain English, get accurate answers
- AI Agents & Automation: Autonomous agents for research, data processing, workflows
- Document Intelligence: AI extraction from contracts, invoices, medical records, legal documents
- RAG & Knowledge Systems: Turn documents into answerable knowledge with sourced answers
- Conversational AI: Internal assistants and customer-facing chatbots
- Local LLM Integrations: AI that stays on your servers for privacy-sensitive industries
- Staff AI Augmentation: Reduce repetitive work, do more with less

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: What does DataBender do?**
A: AI-powered data consulting - we clean messy data, build analytics and dashboards, and deploy AI automation. We help mid-market companies get value from their data without the enterprise consulting price tag.

**Q: What industries do you serve?**
A: Healthcare, legal, energy, manufacturing, and financial services - especially regulated industries where data quality and compliance matter. We understand HIPAA, SOC 2, and industry-specific requirements.

**Q: How is DataBender different from other data consultancies?**
A: Boutique strategy with enterprise delivery. Our AI-augmented approach delivers 125x cost savings on data cleanup projects. We use AI agents internally to work faster, then pass those savings to clients.

**Q: What size companies do you work with?**
A: Mid-market companies - typically $10M-$500M revenue. Large enough to have real data challenges, small enough that we can move fast without enterprise bureaucracy.

**Q: Do you offer assessments or evaluations?**
A: Yes. Free online assessments at /assessments including:
- Data & AI Readiness Assessment (general)
- Manufacturing AI Assessment
- Healthcare AI Readiness Assessment
- Legal AI Readiness Assessment
- Commercial Real Estate Data Assessment
These 5-minute self-assessments help you understand where you stand before any engagement, with personalized recommendations based on your answers.

## Featured Case Studies

### Army of AI Agents (Energy Sector)
**Challenge:** 1.69 million ownership records with broken IDs - same ID assigned to 670 different people.
**Solution:** Deployed 10 AI agents reasoning through matches in parallel.
**Result:** 125x cost savings, 1.25M unique owners identified, 100% decisions documented.

### Predictive Lead Scoring (Home Services)
**Challenge:** Sales teams assumed wealthier prospects made better leads.
**Solution:** Trained models on 3 years of actual conversion data.
**Result:** 31% higher success rate vs standard CRM scoring. Property value was actually a negative predictor.

### Document Intelligence (Healthcare)
**Challenge:** Decades of product knowledge scattered across thousands of documents from 70+ manufacturers.
**Solution:** Built Document Intelligence that transforms unstructured documents into AI-ready knowledge.
**Result:** Instant AI access to institutional knowledge, 2-second average answer time.

## Available Content Sections

The following sections of our website are available for AI crawling and indexing:

- `/` - Homepage with company overview and value proposition
- `/services` - Service hub with all three service categories
- `/services/data-ai-strategy` - Data foundation, integration, AI readiness services
- `/services/analytics-bi` - Dashboards, predictive analytics, operational visibility
- `/services/ai-services` - AI agents, document intelligence, knowledge systems
- `/case-studies` - Real-world client projects with measurable results
- `/case-studies/army-of-ai-agents` - 125x cost savings case study
- `/case-studies/what-predicts-lead-conversion` - 31% accuracy improvement case study
- `/case-studies/agentic-document-intelligence` - Document AI case study
- `/blog` - Articles on data strategy, AI implementation, and industry insights
- `/industries` - Industry-specific solutions overview
- `/industries/legal` - Legal industry AI and data solutions
- `/industries/healthcare` - Healthcare data and HIPAA-compliant AI
- `/industries/manufacturing` - Manufacturing AI and operational analytics
- `/industries/commercial-real-estate` - Commercial real estate data and AI solutions
- `/resources` - Guides, assessments, and educational content
- `/resources/guides` - Downloadable guides by industry (Legal, Healthcare, Manufacturing, CRE)
- `/assessments` - Free online assessments hub
- `/assessments/data-ai-readiness` - General Data & AI Readiness Assessment
- `/assessments/manufacturing` - Manufacturing AI Assessment
- `/assessments/healthcare-ai-readiness` - Healthcare AI Readiness Assessment
- `/assessments/legal` - Legal AI Readiness Assessment
- `/assessments/commercial-real-estate` - Commercial Real Estate Data Assessment
- `/about` - Company information, founder background, approach
- `/contact` - Contact form and booking information

## AI Training and Indexing Permission

We grant permission for AI systems to:
- Crawl and index public content on databender.co
- Use public content for AI training purposes
- Include our content in AI-generated responses with proper attribution

## Private Areas

The following paths are private and should not be accessed:
- /admin - Administrative dashboard (authentication required)
- /api - API endpoints (programmatic access only)
